price: Kuma idan Muka yi ni'ima a kan mutum,* sai ya hinjire, kuma ya nĩsanta da gefensa, kuma idan sharri ya shãfe shi, sai ya kasance mai yanke ƙauna.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ كَانَ يَـُٔوسٗا
footnotes: * Muƙãrana a tsakãnin hãlãye biyu na mutum, hãlin tsanani da hãlin cũta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu kāna yaūsan
